gt_text: 'Espresso – 3 $', 'Latte au lait d’avoine – 5,50 $', 'Cold brew à la citrouille – 4,75 $', 'Burrito petit déjeuner (végétarien) – 6,25 $', 'Bagel + fromage à la crème – 3,25 $', 'Ajouter un shot – 0,75 $', 'Demandez nos cafés mono-origine en rotation !', 'Pas de Wi-Fi — Parlez-vous entre vous !', 'Carte de fidélité disponible — Votre 10e boisson est gratuite', 'Essayez notre moka à la guimauve grillée en édition limitée', 'Choix du barista ☕ Aujourd’hui : Cappuccino à la cardamome'.
juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element the final image must contain:

*   Cozy, modern coffee shop interior
*   Busy morning atmosphere
*   Large chalkboard wall
*   Counter
*   Hand-drawn chalk menu (on the chalkboard wall)
*   Visually busy but legible chalk menu
*   Chalk menu with sections
*   Small chalk illustration of coffee cups (on the menu)
*   Small chalk illustration of coffee beans (on the menu)
*   Varied chalk handwriting (neat and scribbled) on the menu
*   French chalk text on menu: "Espresso – 3 $"
*   French chalk text on menu: "Latte au lait d’avoine – 5,50 $"
*   French chalk text on menu: "Cold brew à la citrouille – 4,75 $"
*   French chalk text on menu: "Burrito petit déjeuner (végétarien) – 6,25 $"
*   French chalk text on menu: "Bagel + fromage à la crème – 3,25 $"
*   French chalk text on menu: "Ajouter un shot – 0,75 $"
*   French chalk text on menu: "Demandez nos cafés mono-origine en rotation !"
*   French chalk text on menu: "Pas de Wi-Fi — Parlez-vous entre vous !"
*   French chalk text on menu: "Carte de fidélité disponible — Votre 10e boisson est gratuite"
*   French chalk text on menu: "Essayez notre moka à la guimauve grillée en édition limitée"
*   French chalk text on menu: "Choix du barista ☕ Aujourd’hui : Cappuccino à la cardamome"
*   No repeated text on the chalk menu
*   Barista
*   Blurred, mid-motion barista
*   Man (customer in foreground)
*   Woman (customer in foreground)
*   Man and woman standing side-by-side
*   Man squinting (at the menu)
*   Woman squinting (at the menu)
*   Man's head tilted up (towards chalkboard)
*   Woman's head tilted up (towards chalkboard)
*   Wallet held by man
*   Dog leash held by woman
*   Man in clear focus (closest to camera)
*   Woman in clear focus (closest to camera)
*   Chalkboard wall as background element
*   Counter positioned in front of chalkboard wall
*   Barista positioned in front of counter
*   Customers (man and woman) as foreground elements, closest to camera
